\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}

\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{siunitx}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\pgfplotsset{compat=1.10}

%% Colormap
% SIFT
\definecolor{color_sift}      {rgb}{0.9294,0.4902,0.1923}
\definecolor{color_sift_ag}   {rgb}{1,0.7529,0}
\definecolor{color_sift_ags}  {rgb}{0.9,0.65,0.4}
% SURF
\definecolor{color_surf}      {rgb}{0.620,0.1,0.6}
\definecolor{color_surf_ag}   {rgb}{0.7,0.3,0.4}
\definecolor{color_surf_ags}{rgb}{1,0.6961,0.8}
% KAZE
\definecolor{color_kaze}      {rgb}{0.4,0.20,0}
\definecolor{color_kaze_ag}   {rgb}{0.6, 0.3, 0}
\definecolor{color_kaze_ags}{rgb}{0.7529,0.5647,0}
% BRISK
\definecolor{color_brisk}      {rgb}{0,0,0.5961}
\definecolor{color_brisk_ag}   {rgb}{0,0,1}
\definecolor{color_brisk_ags}{rgb}{0.2,0.6,1}
% ORB
\definecolor{color_orb}      {rgb}{0.2196,0.3412,0.1373}
\definecolor{color_orb_ag}   {rgb}{0.20,0.5176,0.2}
\definecolor{color_orb_ags}{rgb}{0.5725,0.8157,0.3137}
% RADIAL
\definecolor{color_radial_ag}   {rgb}{0.8,0.0,0.0}
\definecolor{color_radial_ags}{rgb}{0.6,0,0.1294}

%% Bar grouping
\pgfplotsset{
	% #1: index in the group(0,1,2,...)
	% #2: number of plots of that group
	bar group size/.style 2 args={
		/pgf/bar shift={%
			% total width = n*w + (n-1)*skip
			% -> subtract half for centering
			-0.5*(#2*\pgfplotbarwidth + (#2-1)*\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/bar group skip})  + 
			% the '0.5*w' is for centering
			(.5+#1)*\pgfplotbarwidth + #1*\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/bar group skip}},%
	},
	bar group skip/.initial=2pt, % Spacing between two bars in a group
	% #1: color at top
	% #2: color at bottom
	shaded bar/.style 2 args={top color=#1,bottom color=white!30!#1,draw=black!30!#1},%
}


\begin{document}
	
\begin{tikzpicture}
\clip (-1, -1) rectangle (10.25, 6.75);
\begin{axis}[
	width=10cm,
	height=6cm,
	title=$$TITLE_STRING$$,
	title style = {yshift=-1.5ex, font=\Large\bfseries},
	enlarge x limits = 0.15,
	scale only axis,
	ymajorgrids,
	ybar,
	bar width = 0.4cm,
	xtick pos = left,
	ytick pos = left,
    $$Y_AXIS_SPEC$$
	symbolic x coords = { sift, surf, kaze, brisk, orb, radial },
	xtick = { sift, surf, kaze, brisk, orb, radial },
	xticklabels = { $$TICK_SIFT$$, $$TICK_SURF$$, $$TICK_KAZE$$, $$TICK_BRISK$$, $$TICK_ORB$$, $$TICK_RADIAL$$ },
	xticklabel style = {align=center},
	axis background/.style = {fill=none},
	major grid style = {white!85!black},
]

%% SIFT
\addplot[bar group size={0}{3},shaded bar={color_sift}{}]      coordinates {(sift,$$VALUE_SIFT$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{3},shaded bar={color_sift_ag}{}]   coordinates {(sift,$$VALUE_SIFT_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={2}{3},shaded bar={color_sift_ags}{}]  coordinates {(sift,$$VALUE_SIFT_AGS$$) };%

%% SURF
\addplot[bar group size={0}{3},shaded bar={color_surf}{}]      coordinates {(surf,$$VALUE_SURF$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{3},shaded bar={color_surf_ag}{}]   coordinates {(surf,$$VALUE_SURF_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={2}{3},shaded bar={color_surf_ags}{}]  coordinates {(surf,$$VALUE_SURF_AGS$$) };%

%% KAZE
\addplot[bar group size={0}{3},shaded bar={color_kaze}{}]      coordinates {(kaze,$$VALUE_KAZE$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{3},shaded bar={color_kaze_ag}{}]   coordinates {(kaze,$$VALUE_KAZE_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={2}{3},shaded bar={color_kaze_ags}{}]  coordinates {(kaze,$$VALUE_KAZE_AGS$$) };%

%% BRISK
\addplot[bar group size={0}{3},shaded bar={color_brisk}{}]      coordinates {(brisk,$$VALUE_BRISK$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{3},shaded bar={color_brisk_ag}{}]   coordinates {(brisk,$$VALUE_BRISK_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={2}{3},shaded bar={color_brisk_ags}{}]  coordinates {(brisk,$$VALUE_BRISK_AGS$$) };%

%% ORB
\addplot[bar group size={0}{3},shaded bar={color_orb}{}]        coordinates {(orb,$$VALUE_ORB$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{3},shaded bar={color_orb_ag}{}]     coordinates {(orb,$$VALUE_ORB_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={2}{3},shaded bar={color_orb_ags}{}]    coordinates {(orb,$$VALUE_ORB_AGS$$) };%

%% RADIAL
\addplot[bar group size={0}{2},shaded bar={color_radial_ag}{}]  coordinates {(radial,$$VALUE_RADIAL_AG$$) };%
\addplot[bar group size={1}{2},shaded bar={color_radial_ags}{}] coordinates {(radial,$$VALUE_RADIAL_AGS$$) };%

\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
